title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
OB: The title of hyperlink builder is changing with settings.
EB: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options" but it is changing with settings.
SR:
1. Click on "OK" to close the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Result: The title of the hyperlink builder changes to "www.actuate.com".

Expected Result: The title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options".
